title: I Don't really see what was so bad this gamechat.
body:
Right so apparently I get banned for one game where I said no decently offending words. As a matter of fact the two bottom laner's in the game were twice as toxic as I was, and I was trying to hard carry. If I get banned for 14 days off of this i'm just going to delete the game and tell others not to play it because this is complete bullshit and riot needs to fix their already trash company even more.
Game 1
Pre-Game
Gutz500PS4: yep
In-Game
Gutz500PS4: ima god
Gutz500PS4: go jungle
Gutz500PS4: dont just stand there
Gutz500PS4: every fucking second
Gutz500PS4: someone is always in my lane ;p
Gutz500PS4: not sure how they used our ult better than we did
Gutz500PS4: im already tilted
Gutz500PS4: eh
Gutz500PS4: not rlly
Gutz500PS4: you fucking ran into it
Gutz500PS4: smh
Gutz500PS4: so they cant jump over???
Gutz500PS4: where tf were you going anyways?
Gutz500PS4: 7 and 6
Gutz500PS4: stfu
Gutz500PS4: ?
Gutz500PS4: i've had leona up my ass this entire game]
Gutz500PS4: and no missing pings
Gutz500PS4: gg.
Gutz500PS4: where even were you that fight?
Gutz500PS4: smh
Gutz500PS4: idk yet
Gutz500PS4: if you get it ill get more dmg
Gutz500PS4: xD
Gutz500PS4: what a joke of a game
Gutz500PS4: hold on
Gutz500PS4: stfu jinx
Gutz500PS4: you're shit
Gutz500PS4: 13 deaths
Gutz500PS4: cuz ur bad
Gutz500PS4: simple
Gutz500PS4: ight please win
Gutz500PS4: i just need you to carry.
Gutz500PS4: ight nice
Gutz500PS4: i didnt get ult off
Gutz500PS4: actually
Gutz500PS4: i didnt get anything off
Gutz500PS4: gg.
Gutz500PS4: gg.
Gutz500PS4: eh
Gutz500PS4: we actually still have a chance fortunately
Gutz500PS4: vayne has a better end game anyways.
Gutz500PS4: worth a try i guess.
Gutz500PS4: gg.
Gutz500PS4: lets just sit base...
Gutz500PS4: shut up kid.
Gutz500PS4: they dont want to fight,...
Gutz500PS4: ive got time
Gutz500PS4: we can sit here all day
Gutz500PS4: gg.
Post-Game
Gutz500PS4: fuckng shit jinx
Gutz500PS4: omfg
Gutz500PS4: she kept thinking she was good
Gutz500PS4: and telling me what to do smh.
Gutz500PS4: gg.

EDIT:
Okay league is actually fucking with me now... 

/var/folders/md/0hzt_48n1cq9vx0348j1st3c0000gn/T/com.apple.iChat/Messages/Transfers/IMG_3809.JPG

dumb fucking company

replies.body:
Chat is meant to communicate to your team in a positive and helpful manner. Your chat log shows the exact opposite of this.

> Gutz500PS4: stfu
> Gutz500PS4: stfu jinx
> Gutz500PS4: shut up kid.

Don't want to hear someone? Mute them instead of being a dick.

> Gutz500PS4: gg.
> Gutz500PS4: gg.
> Gutz500PS4: gg.
> Gutz500PS4: gg.
> Gutz500PS4: gg.

Negative attitude/giving up.

> Gutz500PS4: you're shit
> Gutz500PS4: 13 deaths
> Gutz500PS4: cuz ur bad
> Gutz500PS4: simple

General flame for no reason.

> Gutz500PS4: lets just sit base...
> Gutz500PS4: they dont want to fight,...
> Gutz500PS4: ive got time
> Gutz500PS4: we can sit here all day

Encouraging your team to AFK/appearing to admit to being AFK yourself.

> Post-Game
> Gutz500PS4: fuckng shit jinx
> Gutz500PS4: omfg
> Gutz500PS4: she kept thinking she was good
> Gutz500PS4: and telling me what to do smh.
> Gutz500PS4: gg.

More flaming for no reason and negative attitude.

> [{quoted}](name=4 Step Cadence,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BxG0BEuk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-02-18T04:59:29.430+0000)
>
> Chat is meant to communicate to your team in a positive and helpful manner. 

Not really your decision for what chat is meant for

You're right, its not. Its Riot's. And since negative attitude, harassment, hate speech, and several other chat related things are reportable and bannable, then clearly using chat to make other's feel like shit isn't its primary function.

> [{quoted}](name=4 Step Cadence,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BxG0BEuk,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-18T06:26:32.526+0000)
>
> You're right, its not. Its Riot's. And since negative attitude, harassment, hate speech, and several other chat related things are reportable and bannable, then clearly using chat to make other's feel like shit isn't its primary function.

Right, but your suggesting usage of chat is limited to communicating positively and helpfully, which simply isn't true

Basically my argument. Im not going to mute somebody when they're talking shit to me. If somebody shouts slander at you irl you don't just walk away unless you're spineless. Hate speech is a different subject though. Not once did i slander any race nor did I make fun of the jinx. (If you're including calling her trash it's because she did it before I did). People talk like this all the time and I was trying to carry whilst the jinx was 
1.)trash talking me
2.)practically inting
3.)trying to boss the team around and claiming she knew the way to win (we lost).

> [{quoted}](name=Gutz500PS4,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BxG0BEuk,comment-id=00000000000000000001,timestamp=2019-02-18T19:48:55.556+0000)
>
> Basically my argument. Im not going to mute somebody when they're talking shit to me. If somebody shouts slander at you irl you don't just walk away unless you're spineless. Hate speech is a different subject though. Not once did i slander any race nor did I make fun of the jinx. (If you're including calling her trash it's because she did it before I did). People talk like this all the time and I was trying to carry whilst the jinx was 
> 1.)trash talking me
> 2.)practically inting
> 3.)trying to boss the team around and claiming she knew the way to win (we lost).

Stop thinking of a video game as real life. these are anonymous strangers only identifiable by a made up screen name. You are safe in your house sitting in front of a screen playing a VIRTUAL game. There is no constitution in game. You do not go to jail for speech, you get banned from a video game. This is not real life. Stop thinking of it that way.

Dunno how do to the box shit so ill just explain the chat through #'s.
1.) Jinx was trash talking
2.) gg was when they were literally on our inhibib's so nothing wrong there.
3.) Jinx was still talking trash
4.) there is no talk about afk? don't see what you're talking about there
5.) She left the game already.

Harassment. its not about seeing what's "so bad" about it, as that is very subjective. You can't use your own standards. You need to think of it as "whats so rule-breaking about this?" And the answer is, you harassed a player/players.

> 
Gutz500PS4: stfu
Gutz500PS4: stfu jinx
Gutz500PS4: you're shit
Gutz500PS4: 13 deaths
Gutz500PS4: cuz ur badf
Gutz500PS4: gg.
Gutz500PS4: gg.
Gutz500PS4: gg.
Gutz500PS4: lets just sit base...
Gutz500PS4: shut up kid.
Gutz500PS4: ive got time
Gutz500PS4: we can sit here all day
Gutz500PS4: gg.
Gutz500PS4: fuckng shit jinx
Gutz500PS4: omfg

That's what's bad about the logs.
But it was true.
So just cause it's true, you should be able to trashtalk your team? That won't make them play any better, and I'm pretty sure you have bad games from time to time too so don't act like a hypocrite.

Okay I get trash talked when I do poorly. What's your point? Theres literally no way you don't get frustrated at this game so if anything you're the one acting like a hypocrite. People need to grow up when it comes to words on the internet because for all they know it could literally be a ten year old on the other side of the computer.

> Okay I get trash talked when I do poorly. What's your point?

Mute the trashtalkers, don't do the same stupid stuff as they do.

>  Theres literally no way you don't get frustrated at this game so if anything you're the one acting like a hypocrite. 

Sure, I get frustrated with this game, but I still don't flame in the chat. It doesn't do anything constructive/good for the game, and only lowers the chances to win even further.

> People need to grow up when it comes to words on the internet because for all they know it could literally be a ten year old on the other side of the computer.

People also need to grow up and realise their negative behavior in-game does absolutely absolutely no favors for everyone.

No you’ve obviously trash talked at some point. It’s just whether or not you choose to type it. You should have the right to say what you’d like and why should I have to mute somebody for trashtalking when they’re in the wrong? And it doesn’t do anything, it’s typically my way of telling somebody to stop being cocky.

> No you’ve obviously trash talked at some point. It’s just whether or not you choose to type it. 

You mean I've said it out and loud IRL? Sure, whenever I'm on teamspeak etc with my friends I might comment on my teams poor performance and make them laugh at my frustration, but I don't type useless bs in-game. 

> You should have the right to say what you’d like

But you don't. You agreed the terms when you created your League account. Why should you be able to say something, that in no way will do anything good to anyone? What is the point in that?

> why should I have to mute somebody for trashtalking when they’re in the wrong?

Well you don't have to mute them, but you are just distracting yourself if you keep reading their non-sense and answering to it. You are far better off muting them and focusing on the game and doing your own part of the game.

> And it doesn’t do anything, it’s typically my way of telling somebody to stop being cocky.

That just makes you look like cocky.

> [{quoted}](name=Gutz500PS4,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BxG0BEuk,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-02-18T04:41:28.838+0000)
>
> I said no decently offending words
> 
> Gutz500PS4: stfu jinx
> Gutz500PS4: you're shit
> ...
> Gutz500PS4: shut up kid.
> ...
> Gutz500PS4: fuckng shit jinx

Is this thread a joke?
No Those are not offending words. Tell me what's so bad about the words I said there?
Are you being serious RN
yessir
You were being toxic and being a jerk. If you don't see anything wrong with this, then you obviously need some help.
No honestly I do not need help, league does this where they don't take what other people said into consideration
I didnt get the joke... sorry
